author: Nicolhetti
name: Kick Stream Notifier
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: A cog that sends a notification when a user is live on Kick
description: Have you ever wanted to receive a notification when your favorite streamer is live? Then this cog is for you.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
